title: Seducing Sampson
description: Bella Marquetti has always wanted one man, Sampson, but he has made a habit of walking away from her. When her brother Angelo goes away with his girlfriend, Bella agrees to apartment sit for them. And plans for seduction are definitely in order when she discovers Sampson on the other side of the door. But Sampsonâ€™s days of walking away are long over, leaving Bella to wonder just who is seducing whom.
author: Lacey Thorn
